topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548b3d56636872201ea40500#post_548b3d56636872201ea40500
Gonna have to call bullshit on that. You can't get rid of porn without fundamentally altering the human desire get off, and frankly fuck that. Best you could do is make porn illegal which would be pretty much the worst thing you could do, as it would take an industry that already does have a lot of problems with exploitation and mistreatment (far less than it used to, don't get me wrong) into the realm of actual crime.
